segments.text: This kitchen looks like it's about to be a disaster zone.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The most precarious thing I see is that boy on the stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That two-step stool looks incredibly unstable, almost tipping.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Its legs are splayed out, and it's leaning backward.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's stretched up so high, reaching into the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm really holding my breath, hoping he doesn't fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A fall from that height onto a hard kitchen floor could be bad.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is standing close by, not even touching it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She must trust him to keep his balance, but I'm not so sure.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a miracle it hasn't tipped over already with his weight shifting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's so focused on those cookies, he's probably not thinking about safety.
segments.speaker: PAR
